languageKey.label: SAV JpGraph > Other tags > Callback
Callback object
<callback [attribute]> ... </callback>
Creates a callback object.

Creates a callback object. Attribute: . id="myCallback". Optional attribute but it is requested when using reference to this object. The reference will be "myCallback".
The following tags are allowed inside the data tag
<setCallback attribute1 attribute2 />
Sets the callback method: . functionName="myFunction". . className="myClass". Default callback method is provided, therefore calling this method is not required in general.
<setReturn attribute1 />
Sets the return data array: . ref="data#myData". Reference to the data array which will be used for returning values for the callback.
